sentences: Täna liugu laseme, hõissa, meil on vastlad!
Laseme, see on juba suur saavutus!
context: The word 'laseme' is the first-person plural present form of the Estonian verb 'laskma', meaning 'to release'. In the context provided, it's used as an interjection expressing joyful jubilation and celebration. It appears to be a colloquial or dialectal usage where the verb form has evolved into an exclamation similar to 'hõissa' (hurray/cheer).
